mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(username, email, password_hash, role, status, real_name, gender, phone, department, position, created_at, updated_at) VALUES(#{username}, #{email}, #{passwordHash, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role}, #{status}, #{realName}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{department}, #{position}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, email, password_hash as passwordHash, role, status, real_name as realName, gender, phone, department, position, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM users
SELECT id, username, email, role, real_name as realName FROM users WHERE role = #{role}

mapper.update: UPDATE users SET username = #{username}, email = #{email}, password_hash = #{passwordHash, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role}, status = #{status}, real_name = #{realName}, gender = #{gender}, phone = #{phone}, department = #{department}, position = #{position}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
